Content.Title: Application Process
Content.BodyCopy:
BYU-Idaho's Online Degree programs allow former students of BYU-Idaho and Ricks College, BYU, BYU-Hawaii, and LDS Business College to finish their degree even though they have moved away from campus.

Online Associate Degree Qualifications:

  1. Be in good academic and financial standing at all institutions previously attended.
  2. Have completed a minimum of 15 credits from Ricks College, BYU-Idaho, LDS Business College or BYU-Hawaii with a GPA of 3.0 or higher. If you accumulated a total of 15 credits from attending two or more of these institutions (but did not accumulate 15 at one particular institution), you may still qualify.
  3. Be in good academic (cummulative 3.0 GPA or higher) and financial standing at all institutions previously attended.
  4. Commit to the BYU-Idaho Honor Code and maintain annual ecclesiastical endorsements.

Online Bachelor's Degree Qualifications:

  1. Have completed a minimum of 30 credits from Ricks College, BYU-Idaho, LDS Business College or BYU-Hawaii with a GPA of 2.0 or higher. If you accumulated a total of 30 credits from attending two or more of these institutions (but did not accumulate 30 at one particular institution), you may still qualify.
  2. Students wishing to pursue the Bachelor of Science in Applied Management degree must have earned an Associate of Applied Science degree, and must have completed at least 15 hours from one of the CES institutions listed above.
  3. Be in good academic (cummulative 2.0 GPA or higher) and financial standing at all institutions previously attended.
  4. Commit to the BYU-Idaho Honor Code and maintain annual ecclesiastical endorsements.

Required Application Materials

  1. Part 1 - Student Information
  2. Part 2 - School Selection
  3. Part 3 - Student Commitment & Ecclesiastical Endorsement

* An application fee will be assessed during the first semester of Online Degree enrollment for students who have not previously paid the fee to BYU-Idaho.

Where do I begin?

Online Programs application priority deadline

Fall Semester

August 1

Winter Semester

December 1

Spring Semester

March 1

* If you missed a deadline call the Online Support Center for more information.

If you meet the basic eligibility requirements for a BYU-Idaho Online Degree program and wish to apply, complete the following steps:

  1. Download a step by step tutorial (requires Adobe Reader)
  2. Go to Besmart.com
  3. Click "Apply Online"
  4. Create a Net-ID and password (we encourage you to use the same user name and password for Besmart and BYU-Idaho to avoid confusion).
  5. After choosing BYU-Idaho as your school select "Online."
  6. Begin the application process by completing steps 1-3.
  7. Submit the application online.
  8. Go back to the application to check your status for completeness.
  9. Check your email for further updates.

Need help?

For admissions questions please call the Admissions Office at 208-496-1300 or email us: admissions@byui.edu. You can even chat with us online.
